value.name: Ohio State recognizes 799 scholar athletes
value.description: Ohio State is recognizing a record 799 scholar-athletes according to a release from the university on Monday. To be named an Ohio State scholar-athlete, students must have maintained a 3.0-grade point average or better through the fall of 2020.
